Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: owner
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: User ID of the user who provided identity details for verification.

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: verified
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: true if the identity was verified successfully.

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: verifiedAt
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: Date and time at which the identity was verified.

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: canAttemptVerificationAgain
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: Indicates whether or not identity verification can be attempted again for this user. Set to false in

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: idScanUrl
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: URL to upload the scanned documents for identity verification.

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: requiredVerificationMethod
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: If identity is not verified, indicates required method of verification that the user

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: acceptableDocumentTypes
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: Where required verification method is GOVERNMENT_ID, lists the set

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: documentVerificationStatus
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: Indicates the status of verification of submitted ID documents

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.name: verificationLastAttemptedAt
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html#/s:24SudoI.abstract: Date and time when verification was last attempted for this identity.

Structs/VerifyIdentityDocumentInput.html.name: image
Structs/VerifyIdentityDocumentInput.html.abstract: Image of front of government ID document.

Structs/VerifyIdentityDocumentInput.html.name: backImage
Structs/VerifyIdentityDocumentInput.html.abstract: Image of back of government ID document.

Structs/VerifyIdentityDocumentInput.html.name: faceImage
Structs/VerifyIdentityDocumentInput.html.abstract: Image of person’s face, for comparison with ID.

Structs/VerifyIdentityInput.html#/s:24Su.name: state
Structs/VerifyIdentityInput.html#/s:24Su.abstract: State. This is abbreviated name for the state, e.g. ‘NY’ not ‘New York’.

Structs/VerifyIdentityInput.html#/s:24Su.name: country
Structs/VerifyIdentityInput.html#/s:24Su.abstract: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Must be one of countries retrieved via getSupportedCountries API.

Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html.name: VerifiedIdentity
Structs/VerifiedIdentity.html.abstract: Represents verified identity details obtained via verifyIdentity API.

Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.name: listSupportedCountries()
Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.abstract: Retrieves the list of supported countries for identity verification.

Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.name: isFaceImageRequired()
Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.abstract: Retrieves the flag for whether face image is required with ID document.

Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.name: verifyIdentity(input:)
Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.abstract: Verifies an identity against the known public records and returns a result indicating whether or not the identity

Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.name: verifyIdentityDocument(input:)
Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.abstract: Attempts to verify an identity based on provided identity documents.

Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.name: captureAndVerifyIdentityDocument(input:)
Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.abstract: Attempts to capture identity information from provided identity documents, then verify

Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.name: checkIdentityVerification()
Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.abstract: Checks the identity verification status of the currently signed in user.

Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.name: SudoIdentityVerificationClient
Protocols/SudoIdentityVerificationClient.abstract: Protocol encapsulating a set of functions for identity verification..

Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.name: notAttempted
Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.abstract: ID document is required but has not yet uploaded

Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.name: pending
Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.abstract: ID document images have been uploaded and is being processed

Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.name: documentUnreadable
Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.abstract: ID document images are unable to be read. For example the may be too small,

Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.name: failed
Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.abstract: ID document images could not be verified

Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.name: unknown(_:)
Enums/DocumentVerificationStatus.html#/s.abstract: Unknown document verification status returned from service. Upgrade required.

Enums.html#/s:24SudoIdentityVerification.name: IdDocumentType
Enums.html#/s:24SudoIdentityVerification.abstract: Type of document used for identity verification.

Enums.html#/s:24SudoIdentityVerification.name: QueryOption
Enums.html#/s:24SudoIdentityVerification.abstract: Options for controlling the behaviour of query APIs.

Classes/DefaultSudoIdentityVerificationC.name: init(sudoUserClient:graphQLClient:logger:)
Classes/DefaultSudoIdentityVerificationC.abstract: Initializes a new DefaultSudoIdentityVerificationClient instance with the specified backend configuration.
